channel.title: Indian bastards lazy & on facebook to much!
channel.description:
http://news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/world/south_asia/8423888.stm No wonder customer support is so shit! they are on facebook while talking to us
Indian firms are losing productivity because office staff spend too long on social networking sites, a survey says.
Indian bastard: oh yes hello, my name is jeff, how may i help you? Indian bastard: oh sorry sir, we are about to experience some technical difficulties Indian bastard: Ooo rabadamanana has updated ehr status... Me: what?! Indian bastard: oh yes! nudes of rashibadahlalala Me: WHAT?! Indian bastard: hello, my name is jeff, how may i help you? Me: ...

item.title: Indian bastards lazy & on facebook to much!
item.dc:creator: @bootnecklad bootnecklad
item.description:
@bootnecklad wrote:

[quote=“Ron, post:6, topic:321013”]rabadamanana? rashibadahlalala? could you be more racist?

Yeah I can honestly say we do love social networking as much as the next person and if I had to do technical service by sitting on my ass 8 hours a day, I’d probably be on facebook while I helped someone out or in between calls.[/quote]

Damn it! I knew if I posted that you’d be on my ass within a week… hey ron, hows things

[quote=“Lothy, post:8, topic:321013”][quote author=Ron link=topic=417476.msg3071986#msg3071986 date=1261588929]
rabadamanana? rashibadahlalala? could you be more racist?
[/quote]


Although it’s about Pakistanis and not Indians. :P[/quote]

lold at that…

[quote=“Cowie`, post:9, topic:321013”][quote author=Ron link=topic=417476.msg3071986#msg3071986 date=1261588929]
rabadamanana? rashibadahlalala? could you be more racist?
[/quote]

Oh I believe I could give it a shot.[/quote]

DO IT!

Read full topic

item.description:
@Ron wrote:

rabadamanana? rashibadahlalala? could you be more racist?

Yeah I can honestly say we do love social networking as much as the next person and if I had to do technical service by sitting on my ass 8 hours a day, I’d probably be on facebook while I helped someone out or in between calls.
